title: The excommunicated prince, or, The false relique a tragedy, as it was acted by His Holiness's servants, being the Popish plot in a play / by Capt. William Bedloe.
author: Bedloe, William, 1650-1680.
publisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst, D. Newman, Tho. Cockerill, and Tho. Simmons,
notes: Ascribed also to Thomas Walter. Cf. Wood, Fasti oxonienses, pt. 2, column 373.
Has no connection with the Popish plot in England, but is the story of Theimuraz, King of Georgia (1629-1634) who was excommunicated by the Pope.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
